name: Spicy Chicken and Cilantro Wontons
author: CROWNOFGOLD
summary: These crispy appetizers are a favorite in my family. The flavorsome herbs in this recipe, as well as the chile, give the wontons a nice kick.
ingredients: 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken thighs, diced
3 stalks lemon grass, cut into 1 inch pieces
¼ cup chopped fresh ginger root
½ bulb garlic, cloves separated and peeled
directions: In a food processor, combine the chicken, lemon grass, ginger, garlic, chile pepper, cilantro, soy sauce and sesame oil
Pulse until thoroughly mixed and chicken is minced
Separate all of the wonton wrappers, and lay them out on a clean surface
Set a bowl of water to the side to dip your fingers
Place about 1 teaspoon of the chicken mixture onto the center of each wrapper
Wet the edges by dipping your fingers in water, and wiping the edge of each wrapper
Fold over into triangles, and press to seal
Take the two opposing points of the triangle, and fold around to join together
Heat the oil in a deep-fryer or deep pan to 365 degrees F (185 degrees C)
Deep-fry several wontons at a time, turning as needed, until lightly browned
Remove to drain on paper towels
